tool.name: Cosine Content
tool.description: Measure the cosine content of the PCA projection

param.name: index
param.label: The index of the PCA component projection to be analyzed

data.name: cosout
data.label: Cosine content of the PCA projection

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
The cosine content of the principal components is a good indicator for determine good or bad sampling and can be use to determine the convergence of the MD simulation. This tool can calculate the cosine content of a user define PCA projection. This tool use zero based indexes (0 is PC1).
_____
.. class:: infomark
**Input**
- Trajectory file (DCD). - PDB file.
_____
.. class:: infomark
**Output**
- The cosine content value. - Tab-separated file of raw data of first three principle component.
